explains: adv. 口头上地（而非书面地或行动上地）；用动词地；用言辞地

sentences.en: He alleged that he was verbally abused by other soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他声称他被其他士兵们口头侮辱了。

sentences.en: Information is given to the patient verbally and in writing.
sentences.cn: 病人以口头和书面方式被告知信息。

sentences.en: The company had received complaints both verbally and in writing.
sentences.cn: 这家公司收到了口头和书面的投诉。
